agenda_items.name: DS - Zone changes for 2 61st Place D3
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to declare ordinance amending the Land Use District Map of the City of Long Beach as said Map has been established and amended by amending portions of Part 6 of said Map from CNR (neighborhood commercial and residential) to R-2-I (two-family residential, intensified development), read and adopted as read.  (District 3)

agenda_items.name: DS - RES/Zone changes for 2 61st
agenda_items.title:
Adopt resolution directing the Director of Development Services to submit a request to the California Coastal Commission to certify an amendment to the Certified Local Coastal Program; and

Adopt Negative Declaration ND-03-16.  (District 3)

agenda_items.name: Laurie Smith Handout.
agenda_items.title: Laurie Smith spoke regarding the Airport Advisory Commission; and submitted correspondence.

agenda_items.name: CA-Stipulations w/ Req for Award
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to authorize City Attorney to submit Stipulations with Request for Award for approval by the Workersâ€™ Compensation Appeals Board, and if so approved, authority to pay $71,797.38 in compliance with the Appeals Board Order for Humberto Najera.

agenda_items.name: CC - Minutes
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the City Council meeting of Tuesday, November 15, 2016.

agenda_items.name: CC - Damage Claims
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to refer to City Attorney damage claims received between November 14, 2016 and November 28, 2016.

agenda_items.name: CC - Res/Dest. of Rec. PD
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to approve the destruction of records for Long Beach Police Department; and adopt resolution.

agenda_items.name: CM - Arts Council Agrmnt
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to authorize City Manager, or designee, to execute an agreement with Public Corporation for the Arts of the City of Long Beach, Inc., a California nonprofit corporation, dba the Arts Council for Long Beach, in the amount of $404,300 to fund arts and cultural activities for a period of one year.  (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: CM - SCE Energy Efficiency Partnership Program
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to authorize City Manager to execute all necessary documents and any amendments to Contract No. 32368 with Southern California Edison Company to continue the Energy Efficiency Partnership Program and extend the term through June 30, 2018.  (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: DS - 2017 Sustainability Annual Work Plan
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to approve the 2017 Office of Sustainability Work Plan; and receive and file the Sustainable City Commission Policy Priorities for 2017. (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: DPREP - MOU w/Grand Prix for Radios
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to authorize City Manager, or designee, to execute a Memorandum of Understanding with the Grand Prix Association of Long Beach, for the use of a Portable Emergency Advisory Radio System, for a period of one year, with the option to renew for two additional one-year periods, at the discretion of the City Manager.  (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: FM - Assetworks-Installation of RFID devices
agenda_items.title:
Recommendation to authorize City Manager, or designee, to execute all documents necessary to amend Contract No. 34393 with AssetWorks, LLC, of Wayne, PA, for the installation of fuel system hardware into City vehicles and to increase the contract amount by $141,680, for a revised total contract amount not to exceed $1,174,166; and

Increase appropriations in the Fleet Services Fund (IS 386) in the Financial Management Department (FM) by $141,680.  (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: DHHS - First 5 LA - Engaging Fathers Investment Prog
agenda_items.title:
Recommendation to authorize City Manager, or designee, to execute all necessary documents and any subsequent amendments with First 5 LA to accept grant funds for the Engaging Fathers Investment Program, in an amount not to exceed $160,627, for the period of January 1, 2017 through December 31, 2018; and

Increase appropriations in the Health Fund (SR 130) in the Health and Human Services Department (HE) by $80,314, offset by reimbursement grant revenue.  (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: LS - Use of space at Main Library by Library Fdn
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to authorize City Manager, or designee, to renew a permit for use of space in the Main Library by the Long Beach Public Library Foundation, a California non-profit public benefit corporation, for a period of one year, with the option to renew for two additional one-year periods.  (District 2)

agenda_items.name: Various Min
agenda_items.title:
Recommendation to receive and file minutes for:
Planning Commission - October 20, 2016.

agenda_items.name: CD7,3,4 - Request Study Session for FIS Customs Facility
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to request City Manager to prepare a study session for the FIS Customs Facility to be heard at the City Council Meeting on December 13, 2016.

agenda_items.name: CD1,2,4,7 - Support for Standing Rock Sioux Tribe
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to request City Attorney to draft a resolution including but not limited to the draft language provided in support of the efforts of the Standing Rock Sioux Tribe and their allies opposing the construction of the Dakota Access Pipeline.

agenda_items.name: CD2 - Report Gas and Oil Operations
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to request City Manager to report to council in no more than 90 days on the current oil and gas operations conducted in Long Beach. The report shall include but is not limited to exploration, drilling techniques, capping of old wells, storage, pipeline maintenance, and spill or other emergency preparedness.

agenda_items.name: CP - Budget Savings
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to use City Prosecutor Department (CP) budget savings from FY 16, increase appropriations in the General Grants Fund (SR 120) in the City Prosecutor Department (CP) by $76,932 and in the General Fund (GP) in the City Prosecutor Department (CP) by $76,732 for the transfer of funds.

agenda_items.name: DS - Designate 210 The Promenade North a Historical Landmark D2
agenda_items.title:
Recommendation to request City Attorney to prepare an ordinance and resolution to designate the property located at 210 The Promenade North as a Long Beach Historical Landmark.  
(District 2)

agenda_items.name: EPD - PSA for 6104-6141 Atlantic Ave D9
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to declare the City-owned property located at 6101-6141 Atlantic Avenue, Assessor Parcel Number 7125-036-900 (Subject Property) as surplus, authorize City Manager, or designee, to execute any and all documents necessary, including a Purchase and Sale Agreement, with Amusement Industry, Inc. (Buyer) for the sale of the Subject Property in the amount of $655,578, and accept Categorical Exemption CE 16-273.  (District 9)

agenda_items.name: EPD - Midtown BID D4,6
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to approve the Midtown Business Improvement District Annual Report and Assessment for the period of January 1, 2017 through December 31, 2017, automatically extending the current agreement with the Midtown Property and Business Owners Association for a one-year period; and, authorize payment of $25,255 in City property assessments from the General Fund (GF).  (Districts 4,6)

agenda_items.name: EPD - Uptown PBID D8,9
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to approve the Uptown Property and Business Improvement District Annual Report and Assessment for the period of January 1, 2017 through December 31, 2017, automatically extending the current agreement with the Uptown Property and Community Association for a one-year period; and, authorize payment of $54,561 in City property assessments from the General Fund (GF) and $3,668 in City property assessments from the Successor Agency Fund (SA).  (Districts 8,9)

agenda_items.name: FM - FY 16 4th Dept/fund budget adjustment
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to approve the Fiscal Year 2016 fourth departmental and fund budget appropriation adjustments in accordance with existing City Council policy.  (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: FM - Enterprise Rent a Car - Used Vehicle purchase
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to adopt Specifications No. ITB FS16-175 and award contracts to Enterprise Rent- A-Car Company of Los Angeles, LLC, of Long Beach, CA, and Bob Wondries Motors, dba Wondries Fleet Group, of Alhambra, CA, for the purchase of used vehicles, in an aggregate annual amount not to exceed $500,000 for a period of two years, with the option to renew for two additional one-year periods, at the discretion of the City Manager.  (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: FM - Fritts Ford - 44 PD Interceptors
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to adopt Specifications No. ITB FS16-183 and award a contract to Warren Anderson Ford, dba Fritts Ford, of Riverside, CA, for the purchase of 44 pursuit-rated Ford Interceptor Utility Vehicles, in a total amount not to exceed $1,671,954, inclusive of taxes and fees.  (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: FM - Worthington Ford - 20 PD Interceptors
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to adopt Specifications No. ITB FS16-184 and award a contract to Worthington Ford, of Long Beach, CA, for the purchase of 20 multi-purpose Ford Interceptor Utility Vehicles, in a total amount not to exceed $637,913, inclusive of taxes and fees.  (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: LBA - App to FAA for Runway Improvements D5
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to authorize City Manager to submit an application for the Airport Improvement Program Grant for Fiscal Year 2017 to the Federal Aviation Administration for funding for capital improvements to Runway 7R-25L and to accept such grant, execute grant documents and amend grant documents and grant amounts with the Federal Aviation Administration for entitlement and discretionary funds in the amount of $12,881,879.  (District 5)

agenda_items.name: PW - Plans/Specs for California Ave. Widening D7
CA - ORD/Amending ORD-16-0012
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to declare ordinance amending Ordinance No. ORD-16-0012, which amended the Long Beach Municipal Code by adding Section 16.52.2210 relating to the designation of the property located at 260 East San Antonio Drive as a historic landmark, read and adopted as read.

agenda_items.name: CA - ORD/Amending ORD-16-0013
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to declare ordinance amending Ordinance No. ORD-16-0013, which amended the Long Beach Municipal Code by adding Section 16.52.2220 relating to the designation of the property located at 6509 Gundry Avenue as a historic landmark, read and adopted as read.

agenda_items.name: DHHS-RES/Shelter Crisis
LBA-TNC Pilot Program
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to authorize City Manager, or designee, to execute all documents necessary for an agreement with Transportation Network Companies registered with the California Public Utilities Commission to provide transportation services under a nine-month pilot program at the Long Beach Airport, and authorize the imposition of a $3.00 pick-up and $3.00 drop-off fee.  (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: eComments
agenda_items.title: eComments received for the City Council meeting of Tuesday, December 6, 2016.

agenda_items.name: Supp Memo
agenda_items.title: Supplemental Memorandum - Corrections and/or additions to the City Council Agenda as of 12:00 noon, Friday, December 2, 2016.

coordinates.address: 333 W Ocean Blvd, Long Beach, CA 90802, USA
